item.title: Keynote: Relentlessly Pursuing Opportunities With Python, or why the AIs will Spare Us All!
item.description:
Description

Keynote: Relentlessly pursuing opportunities with Python, or why the AIs will Spare us all!

Presented by Antonio Rodriguez

Talks about how in every startup, success is defined by how many people you can get to hack.
item.dc:creator: Antonio Rodriguez
